tasks.name: Take out the trash
tasks.description: Collect the trash from the garbage cans around the house and take outside

tasks.name: Clean the dishes
tasks.description: Wipe and wash each dish in the sink and put back in the cupboards

tasks.name: Pay the bills
tasks.description: Get the mail from the mailbox and log in online to pay the bills

tasks.name: Update banking information
tasks.description: Call the bank and update banking information

tasks.name: Order food
tasks.description: Order food for the whole family, including pizza
